root.name: One Piece: Grand Battle
root.description: Luffy punching Smoker One Piece: Grand Battle is a fighting game based on the popular anime and manga series, One Piece. Similar to Power Stone, the fights take place on a 3D plane, where random Power Ups and items are scattered across the stage. Each character also comes enters each fight with a support-character that they may call on at anytime during the battle.CharactersThe American version of the game features 16 playable characters, while the Japanese version had sported 19. The three characters that were cut, Foxy, Aokiji, and Eneru, had not yet appeared in the American anime so Bandai decided to cut them from the release. Playable Characters Monkey D.
